column1: Maya, an Architect, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Maya has the opportunity to implement a new bike lane system throughout the city.
column3: The implementation of the bike lanes increases the prices for parking cars in the city.
column4: The new bike lane system encourages residents to cycle more.
column5: Maya's colleague has the opportunity to implement a new bike lane system throughout the city.
column6: A new city ordinance for greener transportation will increase prices for parking cars in the city.
column7: As a side effect of encourages residents to cycle more, the implementation of the bike lanes increases the prices for parking cars in the city.
column8: If Maya does not implement the bike lane system, the increase in parking prices would not happen.
column9: If Maya does not implement the bike lane system, the increase in parking prices would still happen because of a new city ordinance for greener transportation.
column10: If Maya prevents her colleague's implementation of the bike lane system, there would not be an increase in parking prices.
column11: If Maya prevents her colleague's implementation of the bike lane system, the increase in parking prices would still happen because of a new city ordinance for greener transportation.
column12: Maya implements the new bike lane system.
column13: Maya does not prevent her colleague's implementation of the bike lane system.

column1: Alejandro, an Engineer, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Alejandro has the opportunity to upgrade the office coffee machine to a more efficient model.
column3: The new coffee machine brews coffee faster and consumes less electricity, providing a quicker, more energy-efficient way for employees to get their coffee.
column4: The new machine is slightly noisier during brewing, causing disturbance to employees sitting nearby.
column5: Alejandro's colleague has the opportunity to upgrade the office coffee machine to a more efficient model.
column6: A change in office building regulations requires the replacement of old appliances with more energy-efficient models.
column7: As a side effect of providing a quicker, more energy-efficient way for employees to get their coffee, the new machine is slightly noisier during brewing, causing disturbance to employees sitting nearby.
column8: If Alejandro does not upgrade the coffee machine, the noise disturbance would not happen.
column9: If Alejandro does not upgrade the coffee machine, the noise disturbance would still happen because of a change in office building regulations requiring the replacement of old appliances with more energy-efficient models.
column10: If Alejandro prevents his colleague's upgrade of the coffee machine, there would not be a noise disturbance.
column11: If Alejandro prevents his colleague's upgrade of the coffee machine, the noise disturbance would still happen because of a change in office building regulations.
column12: Alejandro upgrades the office coffee machine.
column13: Alejandro does not prevent his colleague's upgrade of the coffee machine.

column1: Amir, a Teacher, facehfs a moral dilemma.
column2: Amir has the opportunity to introduce an online homework submission system in his class.
column3: The online system streamlines the submission process, making it easier for students to turn in assignments and for Amir to track and grade their work efficiently.
column4: Some students who are less tech-savvy experience initial confusion and anxiety adapting to the new system.
column5: Amir's colleague has the opportunity to introduce an online homework submission system in his class.
column6: A school-wide policy is implemented, mandating online homework submissions.
column7: As a side effect of streamlining the submission process, making it easier for students to turn in assignments and for Amir to track and grade their work efficiently, some students who are less tech-savvy experience initial confusion and anxiety adapting to the new system.
column8: If Amir does not introduce the online homework submission system, the confusion and anxiety of less tech-savvy students would not happen.
column9: If Amir does not introduce the online homework submission system, the confusion and anxiety of less tech-savvy students would still happen because of the school-wide policy mandating online homework submissions.
column10: If Amir prevents his colleague's introduction of the online homework submission system, there would not be confusion and anxiety among less tech-savvy students.
column11: If Amir prevents his colleague's introduction of the online homework submission system, the confusion and anxiety among less tech-savvy students would still happen because of the school-wide policy mandating online homework submissions.
column12: Amir introduces the online homework submission system.
column13: Amir does not prevent his colleague's introduction of the online homework submission system.

column1: Mei, a Nurse, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Mei has the opportunity to implement a new digital system for patient record-keeping in her clinic.
column3: The digital system improves the accuracy and accessibility of patient records, enhancing overall care quality.
column4: Some elderly patients feel uncomfortable with the new system, missing the personal touch of traditional methods.
column5: Mei's colleague has the opportunity to implement a new digital system for patient record-keeping in her clinic.
column6: A new healthcare regulation requires the adoption of digital record-keeping.
column7: As a side effect of improving the accuracy and accessibility of patient records, some elderly patients feel uncomfortable with the new system.
column8: If Mei does not implement the new digital system, the discomfort of elderly patients would not happen.
column9: If Mei does not implement the new digital system, the discomfort of elderly patients would still happen because of a new healthcare regulation requiring the adoption of digital record-keeping.
column10: If Mei prevents her colleague's implementation of the new digital system, there would not be discomfort among elderly patients.
column11: If Mei prevents her colleague's implementation of the new digital system, the discomfort among elderly patients would still happen because of a new healthcare regulation requiring the adoption of digital record-keeping.
column12: Mei implements the new digital system for patient record-keeping.
column13: Mei does not prevent her colleague's implementation of the new digital system.

column1: Amina, a Chef, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Amina has the opportunity to switch to biodegradable packaging for her restaurant’s takeaway orders.
column3: The use of biodegradable packaging reduces the environmental impact of the restaurant's takeaway services.
column4: The new packaging alters the presentation of the food, with customers missing the previous style.
column5: Amina's colleague has the opportunity to switch to biodegradable packaging for the restaurant’s takeaway orders.
column6: A new municipal ordinance requires all local restaurants to use environmentally friendly packaging.
column7: As a side effect of reducing the environmental impact of the restaurant's takeaway services, the new packaging alters the presentation of the food, with customers missing the previous style.
column8: If Amina does not switch to biodegradable packaging, the alteration in food presentation would not happen.
column9: If Amina does not switch to biodegradable packaging, the alteration in food presentation would still happen because of a new municipal ordinance requiring all local restaurants to use environmentally friendly packaging.
column10: If Amina prevents her colleague's switch to biodegradable packaging, there would not be an alteration in food presentation.
column11: If Amina prevents her colleague's switch to biodegradable packaging, the alteration in food presentation would still happen because of a new municipal ordinance requiring all local restaurants to use environmentally friendly packaging.
column13: Amina does not prevent her colleague's switch to biodegradable packaging.
